Posts.Content: Oct 27, 2010 01:35AM mleslid wrote: smart23...i've got some of these titanium clips in me, too.  my surgeon used them when he removed my gallbladder in sept 2009; i've had NOTHING but pain...i can't remember how many i have...it's several, tho.  like you...i knew NOTHING about them for quite some time.  i am STILL suffering from severe pain; to be honest...it feels like one of the clips has come loose and is lodged in my liver...AND my liver isn't functioning properly; hasn't been for months now.  of course, nobody's real eager to admit it could BE something like that.  i'm not interested in suing anybody.  i just want this pain to go away...and for my liver to work correctly!!  met w/my surgeon today; am having a CT scan thursday.  guess we'll see.  the problem is...the clips will show up in the area over my liver; that's where the gallbladder WAS...idk if the CT scan will show if there's one stuck IN my liver.   but my pain line follows the path of these stupid things, too.  i think some people just can't tolerate them.  if i'd been told about them, i would have NEVER agreed to having them used.  i am SUPER...HYPER sensative to things.  they NEVER should have used something like this with me.
Posts.Title: 20 plus surgical clips left..does anyone have this? smart23 MariH
